network
*******


Description
===========

Networking Service CLI


Available Commands
==================

* byoip-allocated-range-summary

  * list-byoip-allocated-ranges

* byoip-range

  * advertise

  * change-compartment

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * update

  * validate

  * withdraw

* cpe

  * change-compartment

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * get-cpe-device-config-content

  * list

  * update

* cpe-device-shape

  * list

* cpe-device-shape-detail

  * get-cpe-device-shape

* cross-connect

  * change-compartment

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * update

* cross-connect-group

  * change-compartment

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * update

* cross-connect-location

  * list

* cross-connect-port-speed-shape

  * list

* cross-connect-status

  * get

* dhcp-options

  * change-compartment

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * update

* drg

  * change-compartment

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * update

* drg-attachment

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * update

* drg-redundancy-status

  * get

* fast-connect-provider-service

  * get

  * list

  * virtual-circuit-bandwidth-shape

    * list

* fast-connect-provider-service-key

  * get

* internet-gateway

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * update

  * update

  * list

  * update
